snippet: Shares in LinkedIn, Groupon and Zynga all leaped on Thursday after Facebook unveiled its prospectus. But not all Internet-focused companies have benefited from the social network's I.P.O. filing.
abstract: Shares in LinkedIn, Groupon and Zynga all leaped on Thursday after Facebook unveiled its prospectus. But not all Internet-focused companies have benefited from the social network's I.P.O. filing.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Facebook I.P.O. Lifts Some Tech Stocks
